word: Who can comprehend the love that God has shown in sending Christ to save perishing souls. I am conscious that language is far too feeble to depict this love. And our minds can not take it in. It is impossible even for the angels fully to comprehend how completely He identifies His interests with those of His blood-bought heritage, and how tenderly he deals with the tried and tempted, they exclaim in amazement, "Here is love!"
